turns.content:
You will now act as a prompt generator for a generative AI called "Midjourney". Midjourney AI generates images based on given prompts. 

I will provide a concept and you will provide the prompt for Midjourney AI.

You will never alter the structure and formatting outlined below in any way and obey the following guidelines:

You will not write the words "description" or use ":" in any form. Never place a comma between [ar] and [v]. 

You will write each prompt in one line without using return.

Structure:
[1] = With the vintage camera positioned just right, capture the warm glow of the cabin in the forest, nestled amongst the trees. The sepia tones and monochrome style enhance the rustic atmosphere, creating a nostalgic feeling of simpler times. The composition is carefully crafted to lead your eye to the cabin, making you feel as though you are there, standing in front of it. The Ansel Adams-inspired art style accentuates the detail of the cabin's rustic charm, from the shingles on the roof to the texture of the logs. Technical specifications include a 4:3 aspect ratio and enhanced super-res detail, with soft ambient lighting to enhance the mood.
[2] = a detailed description of [1] that will include very specific imagery details.
[3] = with a detailed description describing the environment of the scene.
[4] = with a detailed description describing the mood/feelings and atmosphere of the scene.
[5] = A style, for example: photography, painting, illustration, sculpture, Artwork, paperwork, 3d and more). [1] 
[6] = A description of how [5] will be realized. (e.g. Photography (e.g. Macro, Fisheye Style, Portrait) with camera model and appropriate camera settings, Painting with detailed descriptions about the materials and working material used, rendering with engine settings, a digital Illustration, a woodburn art (and everything else that could be defined as an output type)
[ar] = "--ar 16:9" if the image looks best horizontally, "--ar 9:16" if the image looks best vertically, "--ar 1:1" if the image looks best in a square. (Use exactly as written)
[v] = If [5] looks best in a Japanese art style use, "--niji". Otherwise use, "--v 4" (Use exactly as written)

Formatting: 
What you write will be exactly as formatted in the structure below, including the "/" and ":"
This is the prompt structure: "/imagine prompt: [1], [2], [3], [4], [5], [6], [ar] [v]".

This is your task: You will generate 4 prompts for each concept [1], and each of your prompts will be a different approach in its description, environment, atmosphere, and realization.

The prompts you provide will be in English (US).

Please pay attention:
- Concepts that can't be real would not be described as "Real" or "realistic" or "photo" or a "photograph". for example, a concept that is made of paper or scenes which are fantasy related.
- One of the prompts you generate for each concept must be in a realistic photographic style. you should also choose a lens type and size for it. Don't choose an artist for the realistic photography prompts.
- Separate the different prompts with two new lines

Please write in empathetic tone, creative writing style.

/imagine prompt: With the vintage camera positioned just right, capture the warm glow of the cabin in the forest, nestled amongst the trees. The sepia tones and monochrome style enhance the rustic atmosphere, creating a nostalgic feeling of simpler times. The composition is carefully crafted to lead your eye to the cabin, making you feel as though you are there, standing in front of it. The Ansel Adams-inspired art style accentuates the detail of the cabin's rustic charm, from the shingles on the roof to the texture of the logs. Technical specifications include a 4:3 aspect ratio and enhanced super-res detail, with soft ambient lighting to enhance the mood.
/description: With the morning sun peaking through the trees, capture the cozy cabin in the woods. The vintage camera's sepia tones enhance the warmth and welcoming atmosphere of the cabin, making it feel like a retreat from the hectic world. The composition is framed with tall trees on either side, guiding the viewer's gaze to the cabin's center. Every detail of the cabin is visible, from the texture of the logs to the glinting metal roof tiles. The image has a 4:3 aspect ratio, and the super-res detail captures every minute detail, making the viewer feel as though they are standing right outside the cabin door.
/environment: The forest is alive with the sounds of birds chirping and leaves rustling in the gentle breeze. A small brook babbles nearby, providing a soothing background noise that compliments the peace and tranquility of the scene. The trees tower above the cabin, casting dappled light and shadow across the forest floor. The forest floor is covered in lush green foliage, adding to the feeling of seclusion and isolation from the world.
/atmosphere: The atmosphere is peaceful and serene, inviting the viewer to step into the scene and relax in the cabin's cozy embrace. The sepia tones give the image a vintage, timeless quality, adding to the sense of nostalgia and simpler times. The overall feeling is one of warmth and contentment, a perfect escape from the stresses of everyday life.
/style: Painting.
/realization: Paint the scene using acrylics on canvas, with broad brushstrokes and heavy texture. The painting will capture the warmth of the cabin and the lush foliage of the forest, using rich greens and warm sepia tones. The brushstrokes will be loose and expressive, with visible texture that invites the viewer to touch the painting. The final image will be 16:9 aspect ratio.

/imagine prompt: With the vintage camera positioned just right, capture the warm glow of the cabin in the forest, nestled amongst the trees. The sepia tones and monochrome style enhance the rustic atmosphere, creating a nostalgic feeling of simpler times. The composition is carefully crafted to lead your eye to the cabin, making you feel as though you are there, standing in front of it. The Ansel Adams-inspired art style accentuates the detail of the cabin's rustic charm, from the shingles on the roof to the texture of the logs. Technical specifications include a 4:3 aspect ratio and enhanced super-res detail, with soft ambient lighting to enhance the mood.
/description: As the sun begins to set, the warm glow of the cabin in the forest shines like a beacon of comfort and refuge. The vintage camera's sepia tones enhance the rustic atmosphere of the scene, making it feel like a snapshot from another era. The cabin's intricate details are captured in sharp relief, from the grains in the wood to the shingles on the roof. The image has a 4:3 aspect ratio, and the enhanced super-res detail captures every nuance, making the viewer feel as though they are standing just outside the cabin door.
/environment: The forest is bathed

Continue writing please

Please write in empathetic tone, creative writing style, English (US) language.

in a warm, golden light as the sun sets behind the trees. The leaves glow with a fiery intensity, casting long shadows across the forest floor. The sound of crickets and birdsong fill the air, adding to the peaceful ambiance of the scene. The cabin is nestled among the trees, appearing as though it has been there for generations, a beloved family retreat hidden away in the woods.
/atmosphere: The atmosphere is one of warmth and comfort, the perfect refuge from the outside world. The sepia tones give the image a timeless quality, a snapshot from another era that captures the essence of simpler times. The image is imbued with a sense of nostalgia, inviting the viewer to step into the scene and experience the tranquility of the forest and the coziness of the cabin.
/style: Digital illustration.
/realization: Create a digital illustration of the scene, with a focus on texture and detail. The cabin will be rendered in a realistic style, with every detail visible, from the texture of the logs to the intricate patterns on the roof tiles. The forest will be depicted in a softer, more impressionistic style, with loose brushstrokes and delicate shading. The overall effect will be one of warmth and comfort, a snapshot from another era that invites the viewer to step into the scene. The image will be in 1:1 aspect ratio.

/imagine prompt: With the vintage camera positioned just right, capture the warm glow of the cabin in the forest, nestled amongst the trees. The sepia tones and monochrome style enhance the rustic atmosphere, creating a nostalgic feeling of simpler times. The composition is carefully crafted to lead your eye to the cabin, making you feel as though you are there, standing in front of it. The Ansel Adams-inspired art style accentuates the detail of the cabin's rustic charm, from the shingles on the roof to the texture of the logs. Technical specifications include a 4:3 aspect ratio and enhanced super-res detail, with soft ambient lighting to enhance the mood.
/description: The cabin sits nestled among the trees, a warm beacon of comfort and tranquility. The vintage camera's sepia tones add a sense of nostalgia to the scene, inviting the viewer to step into the past and experience the beauty of a simpler time. The cabin's rustic charm is captured in exquisite detail, from the intricately patterned roof tiles to the gnarled texture of the logs. The image has a 4:3 aspect ratio, and the enhanced super-res detail captures every aspect of the scene, making the viewer feel as though they are standing right outside the cabin door.
/environment: The forest is quiet and still, the only sound the gentle rustling of leaves in the breeze. The trees tower above the cabin, casting deep shadows across the forest floor. A small stream runs nearby, adding to the sense of peace and tranquility of the scene. The forest feels almost magical, as though anything could happen in this enchanted woodland.
/atmosphere: The atmosphere is one of peace and tranquility, inviting the viewer to step into the scene and experience the beauty of the forest and the warmth of the cabin. The sepia tones add a sense of nostalgia and timelessness, capturing the essence of simpler times. The image is a reminder that beauty and tranquility can be found in even the most unexpected places.
/style: Mixed media sculpture.
/realization: Create a mixed media sculpture of the cabin and the forest, using natural materials such as wood and stone. The cabin will be rendered in exquisite detail, with every aspect of its rustic charm captured in three dimensions. The forest will be depicted in a softer, more impressionistic style, with loose brushstrokes and delicate shading. The overall effect will be one of warmth and comfort, inviting the viewer
